body:
I don't think there is a PR here.  It's notice that there is a valuable
work to be done with the knowledge from this.

On Mon, Jul 31, 2017 at 4:15 PM, Mike Cooper <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Sorry, I don't really see how any of that relates to this PR. Do you want
> to do anything else with this PR? Do you have a list of things to do before
> this PR will be complete?
